column5: Hey guys. Not a great day for me today. I hit Pier 4 with my new 2" Power Bait Yellow Grubs, worms, and my old faithful, Gulp Alive Chartruse. Didn't really hit much.  This little guy was the first hit of the day. I'm pretty sure it was a smallie. Any ideas? (Sorry for the bad pic, too much glare on the fish)  Then Mr. Rock Bass
First pic is a largemouth bass...
I did, sir, and sent one with much enthusiasm.   COOL! Granted it was about 2 inches long, and weighed about 4 ounces, lol. Well, start small, right?
if you get the chance take a drive to pier 8 and talk to Lorne (hammercarp). those boys down there will get you into some carp in no time...much bigger then that thing you are holding in your hand
